item.name: Homing Ink Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features a series of runic sigils. Each sigil corresponds to a particular teleportation circle that you know. Whenever you commit a circle's sigil to memory, the sigil is added to the design of this tattoo. At the DM's discretion, you might immediately learn {@dice 1d3-1} random sigils the first time you attune to this tattoo

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Stored Circles
entries: You can use this tattoo to cast the {@spell Teleportation Circle|XPHB} spell without expending a spell slot (you must still provide the material components). You can use this feature twice, regaining all expended uses each dawn.

item.name: Springstep Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features a coil like pattern rising up your ankles and calves.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Eldritch Leap
entries: You can use this tattoo to cast the {@spell Longstrider|XPHB} or {@spell Jump|XPHB} spell on yourself without expending a spell slot. Once you cast one of these spells, you cannot cast that spell again until the next dawn.

item.name: Strong Grip Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features muscle like patterns.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Robust Grasp
entries: While attuned to this item and wielding a weapon with the Versatile property in one hand, the weapon's damage die changes as if you wielded the weapon in two hands. In addition, you can ignore the Heavy property of weapons you wield.

item.name: Boomerang Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features twisting and looping patterns.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Loyal Weapon
entries: When you make a ranged attack with a melee weapon, the weapon returns to your hand via the most direct route after the attack. When it does so, you can use a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} to deal {@dice 2d4} damage to all creatures in a 5-foot-wide line from the original target to you (not including you or the target).

item.name: Burning Fist Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features glowing flame like patterns.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Flaming Punch
entries: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with your {@variantrule Unarmed Strikes|PHB|Unarmed Strikes} and they deal fire damage.

entries.name: Furious Fist
entries: This tattoo has 6 charges, and it regains {@dice 1d6} charges daily at dawn. You can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the {@spell Searing Smite|XPHB} spell without expending a spell slot. For 1 charge, you cast the 1st-level version of the spell. For 2 charges, you cast the 2nd-level version of the spell. The effects of the spell only apply to your {@variantrule Unarmed Strikes|PHB|Unarmed Strikes}.

item.name: Subdermal Chain Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features spiralling patterns of chains, ropes, vines or webs.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Chains from Veins
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, or as part of an attack you make with it, you can summon a {@item Chain|XPHB}, a {@item Whip|XPHB} or a {@item Flail|XPHB} to your free hand. The item is fixed to your hand, you cannot drop it or be disarmed of it. The item disappears when you summon another item or if you dismiss it with another {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}.
If you summon a weapon, its damage die is a {@dice d8}, you are proficient with it, can use its weapon mastery property and you have a +1 bonus to the attack and damage rolls.

entries.name: Iron Reach
entries: When you make a melee weapon attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

item.name: Arcane Enhancement Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo can enhance your abilities. Choose an ability, when you get this tattoo, your chosen ability score is permanently increased by 1. You can't increase an ability score above 22 using this tattoo.

item.name: Ink Tether Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features the design of a dart or arrow on the hand with the image of a rope or chain tightly coiled up the forearm.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin. If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Assisted Grasp
entries: Creatures {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by you have disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws to escape the grapple.

entries.name: Far Reach
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you can cast the {@spell Runner's Rope|J:General} spell without expending a spell slot or providing material components. Once you use this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you cannot do so again until the next dawn.

item.name: Bandolier Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features images of ammunition wrapped around your forearm.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Magazine Marks
entries: When you make an attack with a ranged weapon that has the Ammunition property, you can load a piece of magical ammunition from your tattoo. This ammunition grants a +1 bonus to the attack and damage rolls made with it. Hit or miss, the ammunition then disappears and reappears as part of the tattoo. You can load this ammunition even if you do not have a free hand.

entries.name: Hand Cannon
entries: When you make an {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB}, you can launch a piece of ammunition from your tattoo instead. The attack has the Finnese and Reach properties, and you have a +1 bonus to the attack and damage rolls. The damage die for the attack is {@dice 1d4}, unless it is already higher.

item.name: Overeye Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features one or more images of eyes with crosshair pupils.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Steel Sight
entries: Lightly obscured spaces do not impose disadvantage on your Wisdom (Perception) checks. In addition, attacking at long range does not impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls.

entries.name: Trigger Happy
entries: You can cast the {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB} or {@spell Overwatch|J:general} spell from this tattoo without expending a spell slot or providing material components. For the spell's duration, one or more of the tattoo's eyes become animated, turning to look at the target or area. Once you cast a spell in this way, you cannot cast that spell with this tattoo again until the next dawn.

item.name: Bandolier Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this magic tattoo features images of ammunition wrapped around your forearm.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Magazine Marks
entries: When you make an attack with a ranged weapon that has the Ammunition property, you can load a piece of magical ammunition from your tattoo. This ammunition grants a +1 bonus to the attack and damage rolls made with it. Hit or miss, the ammunition then disappears and reappears as part of the tattoo. You can load this ammunition even if you do not have a free hand.

entries.name: Handgun
entries: When you make an unarmed strike, you can launch a piece of ammunition from your tattoo instead. The attack has the Finnese, Light and Reach properties, and you have a +1 bonus to the attack and damage rolls. The damage die for the attack is {@dice 1d6}, unless it is already higher.

item.name: Scribeglyph Tattoo
entries: Produced by a special needle, this tattoo features an array of letters or the image of a quill that can be moved with your finger.

entries.name: Tattoo Attunement
entries: To attune to this item, you hold the needle to your skin where you want the tattoo to appear, pressing the needle there throughout the attunement process. When the attunement is complete, the needle turns into the ink that becomes the tattoo, which appears on the skin.
If your attunement to the tattoo ends, the tattoo vanishes, and the needle reappears in your space.

entries.name: Dermal Messaging
entries: You can cast the {@spell Message|XPHB} cantrip with this tattoo. When you do so, you use the tattoo to spell out your message and ignore the verbal components of the spell..

entries.name: Telegraft
entries: Over the course of a minute, you can touch another scribeglyph tattoo and bind the pair together. You can sever one of these bonds with an {@variantrule Action|XPHB}. You can use this tattoo to cast the {@spell Sending|XPHB} spell, targeting any number of creatures attuned to other tattoos bound to this one. You know who is attuned to each tattoo and can choose who does and doesn't receive the message, they all receive the same message and can respond to you individually. When you cast the spell in this way, you cannot do again until the next dawn.
